response.original_title: Der Pakt mit dem Panda - Was uns der WWF verschweigt
response.overview: The WWF is the largest environmental protection organization in the world. Trust in its green projects is almost limitless. Founded in 1961, it is the most influential lobby group for the environment in the world, thanks largely to its excellent contacts in both the political and industrial spheres. Behind the organization’s eco-façade, the documentary maker uncovered explosive stories from all around the world.  A year in the making, this film is a journey into the heart of the green empire and may shatter public faith in the panda forever.
response.title: The Silence of the Pandas: What the WWF Isn’t Saying

titles.title: Le silence des pandas (ce que le WWF ne dit pas)
